meanings: (잠을 자다) sleep, (Am, inf) catch[get] some z's, (잠자리에 들다) go to bed
(활동을 멈추거나 이용되지 않다) lie idle, lie unused

vlive.korean: [잠 깨고 랩 하러 가실게요~] [Be awake for the stage~] View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 22. 서울대의 두 동아리 츄플 & 바팩 파이널에서 만나다!
잠 안 온다고 공부하면... Studying because I can't sleep... 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : 잠이여 오너라
잠은 사실 옛날에 잠을 줄이고... For sleep... In the past, I decided to sleep less. 듣기 View video Hwang Chi Yeul : 모두 굿나잇!!
vlive.english: For sleep... In the past, I decided to sleep less.

vlive.korean: 잠은... 좀 자? Do you ever get some sleep? 듣기 View video 컨스TV : 정말 난 친구인거네...[넘버식스] ep5.
vlive.english: Do you ever get some sleep?

vlive.korean: 또 거기 가서 잠만 잤어요? You slept there again? 듣기 View video NCT : 127💚니가좋아💚

examples.korean: He had fallen asleep on the sofa. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 소파에서 잠이 들었었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Her eyes ached from lack of sleep. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 잠을 못 자서 눈이 쓰렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The bed was rumpled where he had slept. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 잠을 잤던 침대가 헝클어져 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The bed was rumpled where he had slept. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He felt dulled and stupid with sleep. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 잠이 와서 굼뜨고 멍청해진 기분이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He felt dulled and stupid with sleep. Add to Wordbook
